content: 64 sts /32 per needle ** k16 p32 k16 repeat this round a further 2 times k 2 rounds repeat from ** toe to place your markers for the toe decreases if you prefer to use them work first round as fol- lows k 13 k2tog k1 place marker k1 ssk k 13 repeat on needle2 round2 k round3 k round4 k round5 k to 3 sts before marker k2 decrease k1 sl marker k1 ssk k to end on each needle round6 k round7 k round8 as round 5 round9 k round10 k round11 as round5 round12 k round13 as round5 round14 k round15 as round5 round16 k round17 as round5 keep working round 5 until you have a total of 16 sts with a dpn k 4 sts from needle1 move the remaining 4 sts from needle1 and the first 4 sts from needle2 onto a second dpn move the last 4 sts from needle2 onto the first dpn cut yarn leaving about 10 inches / 25 cms and graft the toe closed turn sock inside out and darn in both loose threads boddam page 5 further suggestions you could always work a very classic gusset if you prefer but you will lose the reference to the traditional gansey sweaters equally you could do away with the gusset completely by working a short row heel if you are sensitive on your feet you may not want the horizontal ribs just before the toe in this case just work one round where you purl across the instep after the decrease round this will visually finish the pattern glossary st sts stitch stitches dpn double pointed needle k knit p purl sl slip m1 make one new sts by lifting the strand between two sts and knitting it tbl tbl through the back loop k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches separately as if to knit insert left needle into these two stitches from the right and knit onto right needle p2tog purl 2 stitches together ws rs wrong side right side glossary of symbols used knit purl c1b put next st onto a cable needle and hold at the back of work k1tbl k1tbl from cable needle or cable without a cable needle c1f put next st onto a cable needle and hold at the front of work k1tbl k1tbl from cable needle or cable without a ca- ble needle c2f put next 2 sts onto a cable needle and hold at the front of work k2tbl k2tbl from cable needle or cable without a cable needle boddam page 6 rib chart main chart boddam page 7
